mapper.select: SELECT id, start_time, end_time, is_active FROM time_slots ORDER BY start_time
SELECT id, start_time, end_time, is_active FROM time_slots WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY start_time
SELECT id, start_time, end_time, is_active FROM time_slots WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1
SELECT id, start_time, end_time, is_active FROM time_slots WHERE start_time = #{startTime} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO time_slots (start_time, end_time, is_active) VALUES (#{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{isActive})
